title: GORGEOUS BRIGHT 3 BED/2 FULL BATH DUPLEX PRIVATE BACKYARD!
posting_body: ['Hi there,', 'I have an amazing 3 bed 2 bath duplex in the East village at 58 avenue C with private backyard.', 'The neighborhood is amazing with Zagat rated pubs, restaurants, mom and pop shops and lots of amazing things to do in the alphabet city part of the East village.', 'The beautiful bright fully renovated duplex features exposed brick, a brand-new kitchen, tons of space, 3 bedrooms with windows and closets, a large living room with a fireplace.', 'The large bedroom downstairs has a private entrance and a door to be completely separate from the upstairs.', 'Both bathrooms are large, one full upstairs and one private bathroom downstairs.', 'Backyard is large and beautiful with space for a lot of outdoor furniture and a grill, a hammock etc.', 'The building features intercom system, laundry and security surveillance system.', 'Unfurnished', '1-year minimum lease', 'Credit required', 'USA guarantors accepted', 'Pet case by case basis', 'call or text', 'Allie', '718-614-7104']
